phrs.translation: 水合氯醛；水合三氯乙醛

sentences.sentence: No, Chloral Hydrate has a half-life of only 4 hours in people with a high tolerance.
sentences.translation: 不是，对“水合三氯乙醛”有较高耐药能力的人，它的半衰期仅为4个小时。

sentences.sentence: The purpose of the preparation of chloral hydrate suppository and its quality control methods.
sentences.translation: 目的制备水合氯醛栓剂，并探讨其质量控制方法。

sentences.sentence: Results: it was found that all of these factors had influence on the stability of chloral hydrate.
sentences.translation: 结果：发现这些因素均影响水合氯醛的稳定性，其中以紫外线照射及碱性物质影响最大。
